SEARCH
Package com.example.feelink

Class FirestoreManager

java.lang.Object
com.example.feelink.FirestoreManager
public class FirestoreManager extends Object
Central Firestore operations handler managing all CRUD operations for mood events and user data

User Stories Implemented:

  • US 1.01.01.02 - Mood event storage logic
  • US 1.04.01.02 - Mood event data retrieval
  • US 1.05.01.03 - Mood event update operations
  • US 1.06.01.02 - Mood event deletion
  • US 02.02.01.03 - Image URL storage integration
  • US 03.01.01.02 - Username/UID resolution
See Also:
  • MoodEvent
  • FirebaseFirestore

  • Constructor Details

    • FirestoreManager

      public FirestoreManager(String userId)
      Constructs FirestoreManager with user context
      Parameters:
      userId - Authenticated user's unique identifier

    • FirestoreManager

      public FirestoreManager(String userId, com.google.firebase.firestore.FirebaseFirestore firestore)

  • Method Details

    • addMoodEvent

      public void addMoodEvent(MoodEvent moodEvent, FirestoreManager.OnMoodEventListener listener)
      Persists mood event to Firestore with partial field updates

      Handles:

      • Conversion of MoodEvent object to Firestore document
      • Optional field omission for null/empty values
      • Atomic document creation with auto-generated ID
      Parameters:
      moodEvent - Valid MoodEvent object to store
      listener - Callback for operation results
      See Also:
      • FirestoreManager.OnMoodEventListener

    • updateUserEmail

      public void updateUserEmail(String username, String newEmail, com.google.android.gms.tasks.OnSuccessListener<Void> success, com.google.android.gms.tasks.OnFailureListener failure)

    • getMoodEvents

      public void getMoodEvents(FirestoreManager.OnMoodEventsListener listener)
      Retrieves chronological mood events for current user

      Query structure:

      1. Filters by current user ID
      2. Orders by timestamp descending
      3. Maps Firestore documents to MoodEvent objects
      Parameters:
      listener - Callback receiving List

    • getSharedMoodEvents

      public void getSharedMoodEvents(FirestoreManager.OnMoodEventsListener listener)
      Fetches public mood events from other users

      Security notes:

      • Excludes current user's events
      • Requires composite index for multiple orderBy clauses
      Parameters:
      listener - Callback for shared MoodEvent collection

    • deleteMoodEvent

      public void deleteMoodEvent(long moodEventId, FirestoreManager.OnDeleteListener listener)
      Deletes mood event with ownership verification

      Validation steps:

      1. Verify document belongs to current user
      2. Execute deletion if verification passes
      Parameters:
      moodEventId - Local app-generated event ID
      listener - Deletion result callback

    • updateMoodEvent

      public void updateMoodEvent(MoodEvent moodEvent, String documentId, FirestoreManager.OnMoodEventListener listener)
      Updates existing mood event document with delta changes

      Key features:

      • FieldValue.delete() for empty fields
      • Partial updates without overwriting unchanged fields
      • Document ID verification
      Parameters:
      moodEvent - Updated MoodEvent object
      documentId - Firestore document ID to update
      listener - Result callback handler

    • getUsernameById

      public void getUsernameById(String userId, FirestoreManager.OnUsernameListener callback)
      Resolves username from UID with fallback handling

      Implements two-phase lookup:

      1. Check usernames collection mapping
      2. Fallback to UID if unavailable
      Parameters:
      userId - Target user's UID
      callback - Username resolution handler
